short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'the algorithm' with 'a wizard'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever wondered what "the algorithm" is when Twitter or Facebook or someone blames a change on it? Now you know. It's a wizard. And now you'll always know because "the algorithm" is replaced with "a wizard."
